title: House Democrats Issue Report Detailing Trump Crypto Ties as 'New Age of Corruption'
contentSnippet: Democratic staff on the House Judiciary Committee gathered data on President Donald Trump's crypto businesses that reportedly gained his family massive wealth.

title: Robinhood moves into prediction markets with FTX-linked acquisition: Report
contentSnippet: The deal for FTX-linked MIAXdx puts Robinhood and Susquehanna in direct competition with Kalshi and Polymarket as interest in prediction markets heats up.

title: Bitcoin Retakes $90K in Break From Typical Pre-Thanksgiving Price Action
contentSnippet: Just when traders got used to price declines on the Wednesday ahead of Turkey Day, bitcoin pulled a reversal higher.

title: XLM Edges Higher 2.6% to $0.25 as U.S. Bank Tests Stablecoin Pilot
contentSnippet: Major banking institution selects XLM network for programmable digital currency pilot program

title: South Korea's Top Crypto Exchange to Be Absorbed By Tech Giant in $10.3 Billion Deal
contentSnippet: The pending merger, between Upbit owner Dunamu and payments giant Naver, is reportedly focused on the booming stablecoin sector.

title: Hedera Jumps 1% Breaking Through $0.143 Resistance
contentSnippet: Institutional accumulation drives HBAR above key technical levels as futures launch approaches.

title: Robinhood Stock Rises Following Deal That Could Boost Its Prediction Market Push
contentSnippet: Trading app Robinhood may be looking to launch its own prediction market platform, analysts say, following a newly announced acquisition.

title: DeFi’s $55B Plunge Isn’t the Disaster It Looks Like
contentSnippet: Despite a sharp $55 billion decline in total value locked since October, the DeFi sector remains structurally strong, with rising DEX activity and steadily growing protocol fundamentals.

title: Bolivia to integrate crypto, stablecoins into the financial system
contentSnippet: Fiat currency inflation, US dollar shortages, and global competition are prompting the government to integrate cryptocurrencies.

title: S&P Downgrades Tether's USDT, Citing Falling Bitcoin Prices as Risk
contentSnippet: The ratings agency cited bitcoin's rising share in the stablecoin reserves, making USDT vulnerable to falling prices.

title: How the SEC’s revised 2025 plan could streamline crypto oversight
contentSnippet: The SEC’s 2025 agenda proposes clearer rules, safer market practices and stronger oversight for the crypto ecosystem, potentially influencing regulations worldwide.

title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Loads Up on Google, Coinbase, Circle and Bitcoin ETF Shares
contentSnippet: Tech investor Cathie Wood's investment firm remains bullish on crypto and AI, adding shares of Google, Coinbase, and a Bitcoin ETF on Tuesday.

title: Grayscale Files to Launch Zcash ETF After Privacy Coin's 1,000% Price Surge
contentSnippet: Grayscale is riding the recent Zcash hype with plans to convert its trust into an ETF.

title: Crypto Long & Short: The Striking Dichotomy in DeFi Tokens Post 10/10
contentSnippet: In this week’s Crypto Long & Short Newsletter, Martin Gaspar shares a snapshot of where we are post 10/10 and where potential opportunities from dislocations may lie. Then, we take a look at investor

title: Polymarket can now operate in US! Texas buys $5M BTC! MON up another 24%!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors were slightly red, with BTC down 1% at $86,600 and ETH down 1% at $2,910, while BNB gained 1% to $856 and SOL held steady at $136. Among top movers, MON (+24%), SPX (+13%), and IP (+7%)

title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Stall as Traders Brace for Holiday Volatility
contentSnippet: Crypto markets stagnate as traders eye potential Thanksgiving volatility, with a $2B options bet signaling a capped Bitcoin rally.

title: Crypto Market Maker Portofino Said to Be Hit by Another Wave of Staff Departures
contentSnippet: The company's chief revenue officer and chief of staff both recently left the firm, according to a source.

title: Crypto Bottoming Signs? FT Drops Trifecta of Bitcoin Gloom on Wednesday
contentSnippet: As British taxes have been hiked once again, the U.K.-based publication took a victory lap on bitcoin's recent struggles.

title: Bitcoin Treasury Firm DDC Jumps 22% as Company Adds 100 BTC to Treasury During Market Pullback
contentSnippet: The fresh bitcoin purchase lifts holdings to 1,183 BTC as management emphasizes disciplined long term strategy.

title: Bitcoin price risks decline below $80K as fears of ‘MSTR hit job’ escalate
contentSnippet: Bitcoin faces downside risks as a bear flag breakdown targets $77,400, while tensions between Strategy and MSCI can add new pressure on the BTC price.

title: Who’s Kevin Hassett, Trump’s reported crypto-friendly pick for the Fed?
contentSnippet: Kevin Hassett, a White House economic adviser, has reportedly emerged as a leader among the Trump administration’s short list to replace Jerome Powell.

title: Bitcoin analysis sees $89K short squeeze with S&P 500 2% from all-time high
contentSnippet: Bitcoin fielded new predictions of a short squeeze as price kept up pressure on key resistance at $88,000, while US stocks went higher.

title: Morning Minute: Polymarket Gets the Green Light; Kalshi Hits a Wall
contentSnippet: Mixed news for prediction markets as the CFTC approved Polymarket, while a Nevada ruling set back Kalshi and likely the sector in the U.S.

title: Four reasons why Ethereum price remains bullish above $2,800
contentSnippet: Despite Ether’s drop below $3,000, data suggested that ETH price could see a sustained recovery over the next few weeks, as long as the $2,800 support level held.

title: How cooling inflation historically affects Bitcoin narratives and price behavior
contentSnippet: Learn how falling inflation influences Bitcoin’s identity, investor sentiment and price patterns while highlighting consistent trends across past macro cycles.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Debate erupts over crypto’s network effects as investors question L1 value
contentSnippet: Santiago Roel Santos argues that crypto lacks true network effects and is overpriced as a result, but other experts counter that L1 network effects are present.

title: Crypto Game 'Cross the Ages' Launches 'Arise' RPG Alpha Test on Epic Store
contentSnippet: Cross the Ages has released a trading card game, a novel, and music. Now, it's rolling out an action role-playing game.

title: US Investigated Bitcoin Miner Manufacturer Bitmain as National Security Risk: Report
contentSnippet: The DHS has reportedly investigated whether Bitmain can remotely control Bitcoin miners—though experts say it would be hard to do undetected.

title: KakaoBank Pushes Forward With Korean Won-Backed Stablecoin Plans
contentSnippet: The bank is ramping up technical work on a Korean won stablecoin after trademarks were filed ahead of forthcoming digital asset rules.

title: MEXC、毎月の準備金監査を導入　Hackenを独立監査人に任命
contentSnippet: 暗号資産取引所MEXCがブロックチェーンセキュリティ企業Hackenを独立監査人に任命し、毎月の準備金監査を導入。初回報告は11月末に公開予定。マークルツリー方式による検証の仕組みも解説。

title: ロビンフッド、予測市場向けデリバティブ取引所を新設　2026年運営開始
contentSnippet: ロビンフッドがサスケハナと提携し、CFTC認可の先物取引所を買収。予測市場事業を強化し、2026年の独自取引所運営を目指す。市場規模は2035年までに955億ドルに達する見込み。

title: 日本の暗号資産規制、具体的な方向性は？──金融審議会WG
contentSnippet: 金融審議会WGが暗号資産規制の報告書案を取りまとめ。資金決済法から金商法へ移管し、インサイダー取引規制や課徴金制度を新設する。銀行子会社の参入も解禁。座長は「お墨付きを与えるものではない」と強調した。

title: 仮想通貨企業のベンチャー投資、価格上昇でも活動は低調＝レポート
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨金融大手ギャラクシーデジタルは、2025年第3四半期（Q3）の仮想通貨ベンチャーキャピタル（の現状について、市場心理は改善し活動も増加しているものの、以前の強気相場の水準には大きく及ばないと指摘した。

title: F・テンプルトン、ソラナETFの最終上場手続きを完了　まもなく取引開始へ
contentSnippet: 運用資産255兆円を誇るフランクリン・テンプルトンがソラナETFのForm 8-Aを提出。取引開始が目前に迫る中、既存のソラナETFは20日連続で純流入を記録し、累計858億円の資金が流入している。

title: 米CFTC、民間企業CEOにイノベーション評議会への参加を呼びかけ　仮想通貨にも対処
contentSnippet: 米CFTCのファム代理委員長が「CEOイノベーション・カウンシル」参加者の候補者推薦を呼びかけた。仮想通貨や予測市場の規制策定に向け、業界リーダーを募集している。

title: VanEck、BNB現物ETFのステーキング計画を撤回　方針転換に
contentSnippet: VanEckが米SECに提出したBNB現物ETFの修正届出書で、当初予定していたステーキング機能を撤回。BNBの有価証券分類をめぐる規制リスクが背景にあるとみられる。

title: 米上場のリライアンス社、デジタル資産トレジャリーをジーキャッシュ（ZEC）に一本化
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のリライアンス・グローバル・グループがデジタル資産トレジャリーを仮想通貨ジーキャッシュ（ZEC）に統合した。プライバシー機能を持つ仮想通貨への需要が高まる中、サイファーパンク・テクノロジーズも追加購入を発表している。

title: 予測市場ポリマーケット、CFTC承認受け米国市場に正式復帰
contentSnippet: 予測市場大手ポリマーケットが米CFTCの承認を受け、3年ぶりに米国市場に正式復帰。2022年の罰金処分後、QCX買収とICEからの投資を経て、完全規制下での事業再開へ。

title: スタンダードチャータード銀行、21Sharesの仮想通貨カストディアンに選定
contentSnippet: スタンダードチャータード銀行が21Sharesの仮想通貨カストディアンに選定された。機関投資家の需要に対応し安全な保管サービスを提供。様々な仮想通貨企業とも提携を進めている。
